General.Name: Zhejiang Liming Intelligent Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Liming Intelligent Manufacturing Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of automotive precision parts and components in China and internationally. It provides valve spring seats, valve lock clips, sealing plugs, signal discs, valve bridges, tappets and push rods, sheaths, valve caps, ball joints, ball sockets, transmission parts, piston cooling nozzles, and fine blanking parts. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Zhoushan, China.
